text: Native Son is a 1986 American drama movie directed by Jerrold Freedman and is based on the 1940 novel Native Son by Richard Wright. It stars Victor Love, Matt Dillon, Elizabeth McGovern, Geraldine Page, Oprah Winfrey, Carroll Baker and was distributed by Cinecom Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:African-American movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jerrold Freedman Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in the 1930s
title: Native Son (1986 movie)
